name.ch: 英文兒童/青少年文學選讀

remark.en: Undergraduate course. Course level: intermediate. Unexcused first class absence will result in a reduction in grade. The lecturer reserves the right to withdraw students absent for the first 2 classes.
remark.ch: 中級課程。大學部課程。第一次上課未出席，需事先跟老師請假，否則扣學期總成績。前兩週未出席者，老師有權退選該生。

goal.en:
"On successful completion of this course, students will be able to:
 Have a general idea on the term “Children’s Literature”.
 Enjoy reading a number of the best works in children’s/young adult literature; and to read aloud some of the selections.
 Finish reading a selected chapter book
 keep a reading journal.
 Give a group presentation/discussion on the subject.
Finish writing an individual book report."
goal.ch:
"在本學期結束前, 學生應該達到下列目標:
 了解何謂英語世界的兒童文學
 享受閱讀許多兒童文學中的經典之作; 並有機會大聲朗誦適和的作品.
 完成閱讀一本青少年小說..
 書寫閱讀日記.
 完成分組報告以及分組討論.
完成一篇個人書面報告"

textbook.en: "1. Assorted reading selections on children’s literature on relevant websites. (reference websites will be given in class or on new ee-class) 2. Self-directed reading choices on nursery rhymes, children’s poems, picture books at Reading Corner or library. 3. Selected reading on The Tales of Beedle the Bard, three chosen picture books or bedtime stories. 4. One YA novel (of your own choice) (Some recommended novels will be offered in class.)"
textbook.ch: "1.在相關網站上對兒童文學進行分類閱讀new ee-class。 （參考網站將在課堂上或在上提供） 2.在閱讀坊或圖書館自選關於童謠，兒童詩歌，圖畫書的閱讀選擇。 3.選讀《吟遊詩人皮陀的故事集》，三本精選圖畫書或睡前故事。 4.一部YA小說（您自己選擇）（課堂上將提供一些推薦的小說。）"

method.ch: 講授 研討 個別指導 其他

grading.en: 1. Attendance and attitude 10% 2. Group discussions/worksheets completion 30% 3. Read aloud/mid-term/final presentations 25% 4. After-reading learning journals 20% 5. Final written report (500-word essay) 10% 6. Questionnaire 5%
grading.ch: 1.出席率和學習態度 10％ 2.小組討論和協作性工作表的完成情況 30％ 3.大聲朗讀所選的睡前故事/育兒詩/詩歌和簡報 25％ 4.最終個人書面報告（500字）10% 5.閱讀筆記 20％ 6.問卷 5%

flex_desc.en: The course ends in the 17th week. The 18th week is the presentation time online for students who have missed classes or group presentations in class during the term.
flex_desc.ch: 課程將於第17週結束, 最後一週為線上補課或缺課同學補缺報告以及諮詢時間。
